attributes.action: intoduce a life sentence for  carrying a knife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in this current time with the senseless deaths by this knife culture there should be a life sentence if you carry a knife, this may seem extreme but extreme times call for extreme measures & i belive this will stop people carrying knife's imediatley

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Enoughknifecrime/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
